docs.snippet: It would be hard to fathom how quarterback Johnny Manziel, a redshirt sophomore, could raise his N.F.L. draft status through another college season....
docs.lead_paragraph: It would be hard to fathom how quarterback Johnny Manziel, a redshirt sophomore, could raise his N.F.L. draft status through another college season.
docs.abstract: Texas A&M Johnny Manziel, 2012 Heisman Trophy winner, is likely to enter NFL draft; after his performance in Chick-fil-A Bowl, where he completed 30 of 38 passes for 382 yards and 4 touchdowns and ran for a score, it seems preposterous that he could raise his draft status with another college season.

headline.main: Showstopper in What May Have Been Manziel’s Last College Game
headline.print_headline: A Showstopper in What May Well Be Manziel’s Last College Game
